name: My friend's choice
description:
This project has develpoped with Visual Novel Maker in the 2022 edition of the Global Game Jam by:

Alex García (https://globalgamejam.org/users/fomantix), Cristina Castillo (https://globalgamejam.org/users/kity), Daniel Palomo (https://globalgamejam.org/users/daniel-palomo), Yabel Blázquez (https://globalgamejam.org/users/yabelblazquezabad).
